meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of the June 24, 2024 and August 6, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meetings.

agenda_items.title: DFW International Airport’s FY25 Budget
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the budget for the fiscal year 2025 for DFW International Airport.

agenda_items.title: Update on New Banking Depository Contract Solicitation
agenda_items.description: Update on the solicitation process for a new banking depository contract.

agenda_items.title: Update on Real Estate Realignment and Property Management Strategies
agenda_items.description: Discussion on strategies for real estate realignment and property management.

agenda_items.title: Status of Quarterly ARPA Spending
agenda_items.description: Report on the spending of ARPA funds for the quarter.

agenda_items.title: General Fund Reserve Overview
agenda_items.description: Overview of the general fund reserve.

agenda_items.title: AdvantageDallas Financial System Upgrade - Project Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the project for upgrading the AdvantageDallas financial system.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report (Information as of Jul 21, 2024)
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of July 21, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Office of City Auditor Monthly Update on Internal Audit Reports Released Between Apr 13, 2024 and Aug 16, 2024
agenda_items.description: Monthly update on internal audit reports.

agenda_items.title: Family Gateway Property Damage
agenda_items.description: Discussion on property damage related to Family Gateway.

agenda_items.title: ERCOT’s Board Member Stakeholder Engagement Meetings (August 2024)
agenda_items.description: Discussion on ERCOT's stakeholder engagement meetings.
